io.netty.channel

Interface ChannelHandlerInvoker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultChannelHandlerInvoker

    public interface ChannelHandlerInvoker
    Invokes the event handler methods of ChannelInboundHandler and ChannelOutboundHandler. A user can specify a ChannelHandlerInvoker to implement a custom thread model unsupported by the default implementation. Note that the methods in this interface are not intended to be called by a user.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventExecutor executor()
      Returns the EventExecutor which is used to execute an arbitrary task.
      void invokeBind(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, SocketAddress localAddress, ChannelPromise promise)
      Invokes ChannelOutboundHandler.bind(ChannelHandlerContext, SocketAddress, ChannelPromise).
      void invokeChannelActive(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      Invokes ChannelInboundHandler.channelActive(ChannelHandlerContext).
      void invokeChannelInactive(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      Invokes ChannelInboundHandler.channelInactive(ChannelHandlerContext).
      void invokeChannelRead(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, Object msg)
      Invokes ChannelInboundHandler.channelRead(ChannelHandlerContext, Object).
      void invokeChannelReadComplete(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      Invokes ChannelInboundHandler.channelReadComplete(ChannelHandlerContext).
      void invokeChannelRegistered(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      Invokes ChannelInboundHandler.channelRegistered(ChannelHandlerContext).
      void invokeChannelUnregistered(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      Invokes ChannelInboundHandler.channelUnregistered(ChannelHandlerContext).
      void invokeChannelWritabilityChanged(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      Invokes ChannelInboundHandler.channelWritabilityChanged(ChannelHandlerContext).
      void invokeClose(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, ChannelPromise promise)
      Invokes ChannelOutboundHandler.close(ChannelHandlerContext, ChannelPromise).
      void invokeConnect(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, SocketAddress remoteAddress, SocketAddress localAddress, ChannelPromise promise)
      Invokes ChannelOutboundHandler.connect(ChannelHandlerContext, SocketAddress, SocketAddress, ChannelPromise).
      void invokeDeregister(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, ChannelPromise promise)
      Invokes ChannelOutboundHandler.deregister(ChannelHandlerContext, ChannelPromise).
      void invokeDisconnect(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, ChannelPromise promise)
      Invokes ChannelOutboundHandler.disconnect(ChannelHandlerContext, ChannelPromise).
      void invokeExceptionCaught(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, Throwable cause)
      Invokes ChannelHandler.exceptionCaught(ChannelHandlerContext, Throwable).
      void invokeFlush(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      Invokes ChannelOutboundHandler.flush(ChannelHandlerContext).
      void invokeRead(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
      Invokes ChannelOutboundHandler.read(ChannelHandlerContext).
      void invokeUserEventTriggered(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, Object event)
      Invokes ChannelInboundHandler.userEventTriggered(ChannelHandlerContext, Object).
      void invokeWrite(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, Object msg, ChannelPromise promise)
      Invokes ChannelOutboundHandler.write(ChannelHandlerContext, Object, ChannelPromise).

    • Method Detail

      • executor

        EventExecutor executor()
        Returns the EventExecutor which is used to execute an arbitrary task.

      • invokeChannelRegistered

        void invokeChannelRegistered(ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
        Invokes ChannelInboundHandler.channelRegistered(ChannelHandlerContext). This method is not for a user but for the internal ChannelHandlerContext implementation. To trigger an event, use the methods in ChannelHandlerContext instead.

        Invokes ChannelInboundHandler.channelUnregistered(ChannelHandlerContext). This method is not for a user but for the internal ChannelHandlerContext implementation. To trigger an event, use the methods in ChannelHandlerContext instead.
